name: Chair
description:
This is a set of rescued chairs found outside a house before they went into the skip.

They have been lovingly restored, repainted and newly upholstered.

Firstly they've been sanded then lightly colour washed with a light French grey colour scheme - so that the flower details are still visible. The upholstery fabric is in a bold fuchsia colour as a feature. It is finished with a layer of wax to add protection and a light sheen. The overall look is slightly
 distressed.

it is a vintage style wooden chair with lovely details, perfect for dining or in a cottage environment.

Dimensions: H seat 420mm, H chair 750mm, W 460mm, D 430mm

This is a second hand chair so it will show some sign of usage - but this just adds to the vintage feeling and is giving a history to the chair.

Collection from Ipswich is free. 
Alternatively we can arrange delivery or courier service, please contact us for a quote.
International delivery is also possible. Please contact us for a quote.

name: Vintage upcycled stool
description:
This lovely stool would make a great piece in your bedroom, hall or sitting room.

The frames are solid wood painted in off white and matt varnish layer.
The seat is re upholstered with new foam and covered with a retro style upholstery fabric.

Dimensions: H 460mm, W 490mm, D 420mm

If you like to pop in for a viewing and a coffee please contact me to arrange a time.

Collection from Ipswich is free.

name: Vintage chair
description:
This lovely chair was rescued from our local community centre. (Six chairs are available in total) 

They have been sanded and transformed with a Nordic blue greyish colour scheme and new bold fuchsia coloured upholstery fabric to a distressed looking Nordic style chair. The chair has a layer of wax to add protection and a light sheen.

The form is classic sixties style.

Dimensions: H seat 430mm, H chair 760mm, W 460mm, D 430mm

Please note there are markings and dents at the chairs, this is due to the second hand nature.

If you like to pop in for a viewing and a coffee please contact me to arrange a time.

Price is given for one chair, if you would like to buy a set of 2, 4 or 6 a discount will be given - please contact us.

Collection from Ipswich is free. 
Alternatively we can arrange delivery or courier service, please contact us for a quote.

name: Chalkboard frame
description:

This is a feature piece for your wall at home, for your shop, or your wedding to leave messages to everyone in style.

The finish is a colour washed, distressed style with a waxed layer to finish.

Dimensions: H 510mm, W 610mm

If you like to pop in for a viewing and a coffee please contact me to arrange a time.

name: Telephone Bench
description:
This stylish retro telephone bench is a fabulous feature piece for any room of your house.

It's made from solid wood, painted in neutral brown grey with an orange feature colour and varnished with a layer of wax. The seat is upholstered with a bold fabric to add some colour. The inside of the drawer is painted in orange to match the feature colour.

Dimensions: H seat 450mm, H table 600mm, W 1000mm, D 400mm

If you like to pop in for a viewing and a coffee please contact me to arrange a time.

Collection from Ipswich is free.
